attributes.contentHtml:
Darynodes dont even pay for there stuffs. Kiku is begger/ gold digger.
Kiku dont even pay for his domain and his nodes. He scammed many of his ex-executives.
Demon cat(ex-manager) is soo nice that he provided darynodes 2 nodes and hetzner account where he hosted. He Is admin in lush nodes too and demon have 2 dedis of lush on that same hetzner account.
Kiku is jealous of lushnodes and he bought 4 to 5 dedis more from demon cat account. ( dcha = demon cat hetzner account) and dcha got billed 650 usd. So then hetzner blocked ips of that dedis. And kiku dont even care of demon cat health. I remember when demon cat had high fever then kiku dont even care about it. All he care about is dedi from demon. And then demon cat decided to pay billed ammount on wednesday but he asked me if kiku is scammer because kiku behaviour got changed since demon cat got fever. So we decided to test kiku. Demon acted like that he cant pay anymore of nodes as he got fired from his job. At the moment when demon cat sended this message then kiku replied: You are scammer and even fake friend and poor begger. And demon cat even gifted nitro to kiku. Proof that demon cat gifted him nitro:


I dont have proof of that msgs but I have proof that demon pays for his dedi.



and kiku is dumb asf.
